overview: Uncle Kenny has always had a larger-than-life character, which inspired his nephew, Matthew, to develop a love for life and music. A heartwarming encounter with a terminally ill girl at a hospice led Kenny to pen his wishlist to live life to the fullest and be remembered by his legacy. Will Matthew fulfill Kenny's wishes to have an unconventional celebration of life when the time comes? Will his family be able to follow through his Wishlist eventually?
title: The Wishlist
